Interrupts.Name: Parry
Interrupts.Trigger: The Fencer is targeted by an attack.
Interrupts.Effects: The Fencer immediately gains evasion against that attack.

Actions.Name: Iron Kiss
Actions.Effects: May dash 1 before and after the attack.

Actions.Name: Skewer
Actions.Description: Dash up to 3 spaces, then deal damage to an adjacent foe equal to the number of spaces moved.

Actions.Name: Duel
Actions.Description: Mark a character in range 3. Gain evasion against the marked character, and when the marked character takes an action, may dash 1 as an effect after the action resolves. End the mark if the marked character hits the Fencer with an attack.
